 Perceptor:::
Perceptor continued repairing the computer.
  x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: |---Switchblade---|

Switchblade pulls his head and upper torso out of the opened panel, 
and turns around, "Heh, I couldn't agree more." He checks out 
Waspinator, toying with the idea of removing a few key parts, but 
shrugs, and goes back to fixing the burnt out fuses, frayed wires, 
and damaged inner computer panels.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
>

annoyed Perceptor
